articles.title: Julian Alvarez can use Man City clash with Liverpool FC to dispel Erling Haaland myth
articles.description: The Argentina international could face his biggest test to date in a Manchester City shirt
articles.content:
The tour of the United States will have been a positive experience for Julian Alvarez.

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Argentina's lower house leader Massa named economy 'superminister'
articles.description: Argentina's lower house congressional leader Sergio Massa will take charge of a new economy "superministry," the government said on Thursday, the latest twist in President Alberto Fernandez's struggle to contain a worsening economic crisis.

articles.title: Moderate rains improve wheat prospects in Argentina -grains exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, July 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat planting for the 2022/2023 season has been supported by rainfall in recent days that has helped ease drought conditions in some areas, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, a boost for the key farm sector.The exchange maintained its forecast for the wheat planted area at 6.1 million hectares (15 million acres)

BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Argentina's government announced the appointment of an economic “super minister” Thursday, the third economy minister in less than a month as the country struggles with high inflation and a slumping currency.

articles.title: Argentina’s President Names Third Economy Minister in Less Than a Month
articles.description: Sergio Massa replaces Silvina Batakis who took up the post in early July
articles.content:
Sergio Massa, the president of Argentina's lower house of Congress, will take over as economy minister.
